DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective evaluate long-term safety desvenlafaxine succinate sustained-release ( DVS SR ) open-label treatment adult outpatient fibromyalgia syndrome .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating DVS SR Patients With Fibromyalgia Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Patients complete study 3151A4-327 opportunity treat DVS SR 6 month extension study .
DOC.criteria: Outpatients complete doubleblind treatment study 3151A4327 fibromyalgia Syndrome major protocol violation event would preclude patient 's entry longterm openlabel study . Women childbearing potential must negative serum pregnancy test result study start . Exclusion criterion : Presence new/and clinically important medical condition might compromise patient 's safety . Use prohibit treatment . Meets exclusion criterion list study 3151A4327 .
